faq_what_is_answer: PusulaGPT is an advanced AI assistant specifically designed for healthcare professionals, providing accurate medical insights and support.
faq_security_answer: We use enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data, including end-to-end encryption and compliance with healthcare regulations.
faq_integration: Can I integrate with my existing systems?
faq_integration_answer: Yes, our platform offers seamless integration with most healthcare management systems through our comprehensive API.
faq_trial: Is there a free trial available?
faq_trial_answer: Yes, we offer a free trial period so you can experience the full capabilities of our AI assistants before committing.
